Posts.Content: Dec 5, 2015 10:51AM BBwithBC45 wrote: Amstar, my eyelashes fell out completely twice already since finishing chemo. The second time happened just a a 3-4 weeks ago and I'm over 6 months PFC. My eyebrows fell out completely the first time and this time they just thinned. After I lost my lashes and brows the first time I was using Latisse. 30-day supply lasted me about 60 days, but I haven't bought any more of it, because it's very expensive. Some women had luck with their insurance companies covering some of the cost, but not me. I think Latisse did help to grow my lashes quicker and longer the first time - something to consider maybe?
